definition: variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

sentences.english: Enter the contact's name and then select submit.
sentences.chinese: 进入连络人的姓名，然后选择提交。

sentences.english: NO15, Let me write your contact information down in my address book.
sentences.chinese: 让我把你的连络资料记在通讯录里。

sentences.english: Jerusalem is built like a city that is closely compacted together.
sentences.chinese: 耶路撒冷被建造，如同连络整齐的一座城。

sentences.english: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together
sentences.chinese: 耶路撒冷被建造，如同连络整齐的一座城。

sentences.english: Galvanic corrosion occurs when dissimilar metals are in electrical contact in the same electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 的电连络中的时候，流电的腐蚀发生。

sentences.english: These types of Allergies are forms of allergic contact dermatitis.
sentences.chinese: 过敏症的这些类型是过敏连络皮肤炎的表格。

sentences.english: When necessary we contacted the authors of the primary studies to obtain additional information.
sentences.chinese: 当必需的我们连络了主要研究的作家获得另外的数据。

sentences.english: Follow the step, if have any problems , ask originally worker.
sentences.chinese: 按照步骤处理问题，有任何问题连络原厂工作人员。

definition: to refuse to meet sb/to avoid sb
variant of 關聯|关联[guan1 lian2]
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
